de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.pathencryption

    Package Description
    de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.pathencryption  
    de.adorsys.datasafe.simple.adapter.impl  
  • Classes in de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.pathencryption used by de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.pathencryption 
    Class and Description
    DefaultPathDigestConfig
    Configures document path encryption digest.
    DefaultPathEncryption
    Default path encryption/decryption that uses encryption specified by DefaultPathDigestConfig and encodes resulting bytes using Base64-urlsafe encoding.
    DefaultPathEncryptionRuntimeDelegatable.ArgumentsCaptor 
    PathEncryptionConfig
    Path encryption cipher configurer.
    PathEncryptionImpl
    Default path encryption service that uses PrivateKeyService.pathEncryptionSecretKey(UserIDAuth) as path encryption key.
    PathEncryptionImplRuntimeDelegatable.ArgumentsCaptor 
    SymmetricPathEncryptionServiceImpl
    Path encryption service that maintains URI segments integrity.
    SymmetricPathEncryptionServiceImplRuntimeDelegatable.ArgumentsCaptor 
  • Classes in de.adorsys.datasafe.encrypiton.impl.pathencryption used by de.adorsys.datasafe.simple.adapter.impl 
    Class and Description
    PathEncryptionImpl
    Default path encryption service that uses PrivateKeyService.pathEncryptionSecretKey(UserIDAuth) as path encryption key.
